flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=1000>>1000 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 1000*0.7=<<1000*0.7=700.0>>700.0 votes
So the other candidate got 1000-700.0=<<1000-700.0=3000.0>>3000.0 votes
This means he got 3000.0-150=<<3000.0-150=2850.0>>2850.0 more votes than John.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300.0, not 3000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
